text: I feel so hopeless lately, like nothing matters.
label: depression
suggestion: You're not alone. Consider speaking with a professional or journaling your thoughts daily.

text: I’m constantly overthinking every little thing.

suggestion: Try some breathing exercises or take a short break. Small pauses can refresh the mind.
